resources.string: The Golghar or Gol Ghar (गोलघर), ("Round house") is a large granary located to the west of the Gandhi Maidan in Patna, capital of Bihar state, India. This app offers the detailed history and relevant information about the popular Indian places and tourism ideas. The main motto is to create awareness about our rich culture and heritage among the local residents.It is designed user friendly, so that more and more number of citizens can be benefited. The app contains a number of dazzling photos and articles about Indian tourism such as natural beauty,geographic wonders, local customs, historic sites, diverse culture and arts of India.It also gives information about various Dance Forms of india which are intangible heritage.User can also check into hotels using OYO app. There are more than 500+ tourist destinations in our app which are classified in different categories like state wise, latest trends.Users can also view information about various musical instruments!
